text: Si<MER>yr haW/*.iyri<TIP>ym '<HPA>SE<MER>r liS@lomo<SIL>h:
yiW/*.Aqe<AZL>niy<PAS> min*@Siyq<MUN>w^ot p*i<ZQP>yhw* k*i<SIL>y=Tw^obi<MER>ym d*odE<TIP>ykA miy*A<SIL>yin:
l@re<AZL>yxa<PAS> S@mAnE<MUN>ykA Tw^obi<ZQP>ym SE<TIP>mEn t*w*ra<MUN>q S@mE<ATN>kA `al=k*e<TIP>n `<HPA>lAm<MER>w^ot '<HPA>heb<SIL>w*kA:

mAS@ke<TIP>niy 'a<SIL>x<HPA>rE<MUN>ykA n*Ar<ATN>w*YAh h<HSE>biy'a<AZL>niy ham*E<GER>lEk@ x<HPA>dArA<RBM>yw nAgi<MEH>ylAh w@niW@m@xAh<PAS> b*A<ZQP>k@ naz@k*i<MEH>yrAh dodE<AZL>ykA<PAS> miy*a<ZQP>yin me<SIL>ySAri<TIP>ym '<HPA>heb<SIL>w*kA:
S@xw^orA<MEH>h '<HPA>niy<PAS> w@<SIL>nA'wA<ZQP>h b*@n<TIP>w^ot y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<ATN>im k*@'A<SIL>h<HQA>le<MUN>y qedA<ZQP>r k*i<SIL>yriy`<TIP>w^ot S@lomo<SIL>h:

'al=t*ir@'<AZL>w*niy<PAS> SE<SIL>'<HPA>ni<MUN>y S@xar@xo<ZQP>rEt SEW/*.@zApa<TIP>t@niy haW/*.A<ATN>mES b*@ne<DAR>y 'im*i<MUN>y ni<SIL>x<HPA>rw*=bi<RBM>y WAmu<AZL>niy<PAS> no<SIL>TerA<MUN>h 'Et=hak*@rAmi<ZQP>ym k*ar@mi<MER>y SEl*i<TIP>y lo<MER>' nATA<SIL>r@t*iy:

hag*i<MUN>ydAh l*i<RBM>y SE<MEH>'A<SIL>h<HPA>bAh<PAS> nap@Si<ZQP>y 'eykA<MUN>h tir@`E<ZQP>h 'eykA<TIP>h t*ar@b*i<MUN>yY b*a<SIL>Y*Ah<HQA>rA<ATN>yim Sal*AmA<MEH>h 'E<SIL>h@yEh<PAS> k*@`o<MUN>T@yA<ZQP>h `a<TIP>l `Ed@re<MER>y x<HPA>berE<SIL>ykA:

'im=lo<MEH>' te<SIL>d@`iy<PAS> lA<ZQP>k@ hay*ApA<TIP>h b*an*ASi<ATN>ym Y@<SIL>'iy=lA<GAR>k@ b*@`iq@be<MUN>y haY*o<RBM>'n w*r@`iy<PAS> 'Et=g*@diy*ota<ZQP>yik@ `a<TIP>l miS@k*@n<MER>w^ot hA<SIL>ro`i<SIL>ym:
l@su<SIL>sAtiy<PAS> b*@rik@be<MUN>y par@`o<ZQP>h d*im*iyti<TIP>yk@ ra`@yAti<SIL>y:
nA'w<MEH>w* l@xAya<AZL>yik@<PAS> b*at*ori<ZQP>ym Yaw*A're<TIP>k@ b*a<SIL>x<HPA>rw*zi<SIL>ym:
t*w^ore<MEH>y zAhAb<PAS> na<SIL>`<HPA>WEh=l*A<ZQP>k@ `i<TIP>m n@qud*<MER>w^ot hak*A<SIL>sEp:
`ad=SE<MEH>ham*E<AZL>lEk@<PAS> b*im@sib*<ZQP>w^o nir@d*i<TIP>y nAta<MER>n reyx<SIL>w^o:
Y@r<AZL>w^or ham*o<MEH>r | d*w^odiy<PAS> li<ZQP>y b*e<MER>yn SAda<TIP>y yAli<SIL>yn:
'ES@k*o<AZL>l hak*o<MEH>pEr | d*w^odiy<PAS> li<ZQP>y b*@kar@me<TIP>y `e<MER>yn g*E<SIL>diy:
hin*A<MEH>k@ yApAh<PAS> ra`@yAti<ZQP>y hin*A<MER>k@ yApA<TIP>h `eyna<MER>yik@ yw^oni<SIL>ym:
hin*@kA<AZL> yApE<MEH>h dw^odiy<PAS> 'a<MUN>p nA`i<ZQP>ym 'ap=`ar@We<TIP>nw* ra<SIL>`<HPA>nAnA<SIL>h:
qor<MEH>w^ot b*At*e<AZL>ynw*<PAS> '<HPA>rAzi<ZQP>ym rxyTnw (ra<SIL>hiyTe<TIP>nw*) b*@rw^oti<SIL>ym:
'<HPA>niy<PAS> x<HPA>baY*E<MUN>lEt haW/*.Ar<ZQP>w^on S<SIL>w^oSan*a<TIP>t hA<SIL>`<HPA>mAqi<SIL>ym:
k*@S<SIL>w^oSan*Ah<PAS> b*e<MUN>yn ha<SIL>xw^oxi<ZQP>ym k*e<MER>n ra`@yAti<TIP>y b*e<MER>yn hab*An<SIL>w^ot:

k*@tap*<AZL>w*xa<PAS> b*a<SIL>`<HPA>Ye<MUN>y hay*a<ZQP>`ar k*e<MER>n d*w^odi<TIP>y b*e<MUN>yn hab*Ani<ATN>ym b*@Yil*w^o<PAS> xim*a<MUN>d@t*iy w@yASa<ZQP>b@t*iy w*pir@y<TIP>w^o mAt<MER>w^oq l@xik*i<SIL>y:
h<HSE>biy'a<AZL>niy<PAS> 'El=b*e<MUN>yt hay*A<ZQP>yin w@dig@l<MER>w^o `Ala<TIP>y 'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<SIL>h:
sam*@k<AZL>w*niy<PAS> b*A<SIL>'<HPA>SiyS<ZQP>w^ot rap*@d<TIP>w*niy b*at*ap*w*xi<ATN>ym k*i<SIL>y=xw^ola<MER>t 'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<TIP>h 'A<SIL>niy:
W@mo'lw^o<PAS> t*a<MUN>xat l@ro'Si<ZQP>y wi<SIL>ymiyn<TIP>w^o t*@xab*@qe<SIL>niy:

hiS@b*a<AZL>`@t*iy 'Et@kE<GER>m b*@n<MEH>w^ot y@r<SIL>w*SAla<AZL>im<PAS> b*iY@bA'<ZQP>w^ot '<TIP>w^o b*@'ay@l<MUN>w^ot haW/*ׂAdE<ATN>h 'im=t*A`i<DAR>yrw* | w@<SIL>'im=t*@`<MER>w^or@r<TEB>w* 'Et=hA'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<TIP>h `a<MER>d SEt*Ex@p*A<SIL>Y:
q<MUN>w^ol d*w^odi<ZQP>y hin*eh=zE<TIP>h b*A<ATN>' m@dal*eg<PAS> `al=hE<MUN>hAri<ZQP>ym m@qap*e<TIP>Y `al=hag*@bA`<SIL>w^ot:

d*w^omE<MEH>h dw^odiy<PAS> liY@bi<ZQP>y '<TIP>w^o l@`o<MUN>pEr hA<SIL>'ay*Ali<ATN>ym hin*eh=zE<MEH>h `w^omed<PAS> 'axa<MUN>r k*At@le<ZQP>nw* maS@g*i<AZL>yxa<PAS> min=ha<SIL>xal*on<ZQP>w^ot meYi<TIP>yY min=ha<SIL>x<HPA>rak*i<SIL>ym:
`AnA<MER>h dw^odi<TIP>y w@'A<MUN>mar li<ATN>y q<MER>w*miy lA<TEB>k@ ra`@yAti<MER>y yA<SIL>pAti<TIP>y w*l@kiy=lA<SIL>k@:
k*i<SIL>y=hin*e<MER>h has*@tA<TIP>w `AbA<ATN>r hag*E<ZQM>SEm xAla<TIP>p hAla<MER>k@ l<SIL>w^o:
han*iY*Aniym<PAS> nir@'<MUN>w* bA'A<ZQP>rEY `e<MER>t haz*Ami<TIP>yr hig*i<ATN>y`a w@q<MER>w^ol hat*<TIP>w^or niS@ma<MER>` b*@'ar@Ye<SIL>nw*:
hat*@'enAh<PAS> xA<SIL>n@TA<MUN>h pag*E<ZQP>yhA w@hag*@pAni<MER>ym | s@mAda<TIP>r nA<MUN>t@nw* re<ATN>yxa q<MER>w*miy lky (lA<TEB>k@) ra`@yAti<MER>y yA<SIL>pAti<TIP>y w*l@kiy=lA<SIL>k@:

y<SIL>w^onAti<GAR>y b*@xag@we<MUN>y has*E<RBM>la` b*@se<AZL>tEr<PAS> ham*ad@regA<ZQP>h har@'i<AZL>yniy<PAS> 'Et=mar@'a<ZQP>yik@ haS@miy`i<TIP>niy 'Et=qw^ole<ATN>k@ k*i<SIL>y=qw^ole<MER>k@ `Are<TIP>b w*mar@'e<MER>yk@ nA'wE<SIL>h:
'E<SIL>x<HSE>zw*=lA<AZL>nw*<PAS> Su<SIL>`Ali<ZQP>ym Su<SIL>`Ali<MER>ym q@Tan*i<TIP>ym m@xab*@li<MUN>ym k*@rAmi<ATN>ym w*k@rAme<TIP>ynw* s@mAda<SIL>r:
d*w^odi<MER>y liy<PAS> wa<SIL>'<HPA>ni<MUN>y l<ZQP>w^o hA<SIL>ro`E<TIP>h b*aW/*.<SIL>w^oSan*i<SIL>ym:

`a<MEH>d SEy*Ap<AZL>w*xa<PAS> hay*<ZQP>w^om w@nA<TIP>sw* haY*@lAli<ATN>ym sob<TLP> d*@me<SIL>h=l@kA<AZL> dw^odi<GER>y liY@bi<RBM>y '<TEB>w^o l@`o<MER>pEr hA<SIL>'ay*Ali<TIP>ym `al=hA<MER>rey bA<SIL>tEr:
`al=miS@k*Abiy<PAS> b*al*eyl<ZQP>w^ot b*iq*a<ZQM>S@t*iy 'e<MER>t SE<SIL>'Ah<HPA>bA<TIP>h nap@Si<ATN>y b*iq*aS@t*i<TIP>yw w@lo<MER>' m@YA'ti<SIL>yw:

'Aq<AZL>w*mAh n*A<GER>' wa'<HPA>s<SIL>w^ob@bA<MUN>h bA`i<RBM>yr b*aW/*.@wAqiym<PAS> w*bA<MUN>r@xob<ZQP>w^ot '<HPA>baq@SA<ZQM>h 'e<MER>t SE<SIL>'Ah<HPA>bA<TIP>h nap@Si<ATN>y b*iq*aS@t*i<TIP>yw w@lo<MER>' m@YA'ti<SIL>yw:
m@YA'<AZL>w*niy<PAS> haW/*.o<MUN>m@ri<ZQP>ym has*o<SIL>b@bi<TIP>ym b*A`i<ATN>yr 'e<TEB>t SE<SIL>'Ah<HPA>bA<MER>h nap@Si<TIP>y r@'iytE<SIL>m:

k*im@`aT<PAS> SE<SIL>`Aba<MUN>r@t*iy mehE<ZQP>m `a<MUN>d SEm*AYA<ZQP>'tiy 'e<MER>t SE<SIL>'Ah<HPA>bA<TIP>h nap@Si<ATN>y '<HPA>xaz@t*iyw<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' 'ar@p*E<ZQP>n*w* `ad=SE<MEH>h<HPA>bey'tiyw<PAS> 'El=b*e<MUN>yt 'im*i<ZQP>y w@'El=xE<TIP>dEr h<SIL>w^orAti<SIL>y:

hiS@b*a<AZL>`@t*iy 'Et@kE<GER>m b*@n<MEH>w^ot y@r<SIL>w*SAla<AZL>im<PAS> b*iY@bA'<ZQP>w^ot '<TIP>w^o b*@'ay@l<MUN>w^ot haW/*ׂAdE<ATN>h 'im=t*A`i<DAR>yrw* | w@<SIL>'im=t*@`<MER>w^or@r<TEB>w* 'Et=hA'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<TIP>h `a<MER>d SEt*Ex@p*A<SIL>Y:
mi<MUN>y zo<RBM>'t `olAh<PAS> min=ham*id@b*A<ZQP>r k*@ti<SIL>ym@r<TIP>w^ot `ASA<ATN>n m@quT*E<MEH>rEt mor<PAS> w*l@bw^onA<ZQP>h mik*o<TIP>l 'ab@qa<MER>t rw^oke<SIL>l:
hin*e<RBM>h miT*Atw^o<PAS> SEl*iS@lomo<ZQP>h SiW/*.i<MER>ym g*ib*ori<TIP>ym sAbi<MUN>yb lA<ATN>h* mig*ib*ore<TIP>y yiW@rA'e<SIL>l:
k*ul*Am<PAS> '<HPA>xu<MUN>zey xE<ZQP>rEb m@lum*@de<TIP>y mil@xAmA<ATN>h 'i<MEH>yS xar@b*w^o<PAS> `al=y@rek<ZQP>w^o mip*a<TIP>xad b*al*eyl<SIL>w^ot:
'ap*ir@y<RBM>w^on `A<MEH>WAh lw^o<PAS> ham*E<MUN>lEk@ S@lomo<ZQP>h me<SIL>`<HPA>Ye<TIP>y hal*@bAn<SIL>w^on:
`am*w*dAyw<PAS> `A<MUN>WAh kE<ZQP>sEp r@pi<SIL>ydAt<MUN>w^o zAhA<ZQP>b mEr@k*Ab<TIP>w^o 'ar@g*AmA<ATN>n t*w^okw^o<PAS> rAY<MUN>w*p 'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<ZQP>h mib*@n<TIP>w^ot y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:

Y@'E<DAR>nAh | w*<SIL>r@'E<TEB>ynAh b*@n<MER>w^ot Yiy*<TIP>w^on b*am*E<MUN>lEk@ S@lomo<ATN>h b*A<SIL>`<HPA>TArA<RBM>h SE<SIL>`iT*@rAh=l*<MEH>w^o 'im*w^o<PAS> b*@y<MUN>w^om x<HPA>tun*At<ZQP>w^o w*b@y<TIP>w^om Wim@xa<MER>t lib*<SIL>w^o:

hin*A<AZL>k@ yApA<MEH>h ra`@yAtiy<PAS> hin*A<MUN>k@ yApA<ZQP>h `eyna<MUN>yik@ yw^oni<ZQP>ym mib*a<TIP>`ad l@Yam*Ate<ATN>k@ Wa`@rek@<PAS> k*@`e<MUN>dEr hA<SIL>`iz*i<ZQP>ym SEg*A<SIL>l@S<TIP>w* meha<MER>r g*il@`A<SIL>d:
Sin*a<AZL>yik@<PAS> k*@`e<MUN>dEr haq*@Yw*b<ZQP>w^ot SE<SIL>`Al<TIP>w* min=hA<SIL>rax@YA<ATN>h SEk*ul*Am<PAS> mat@'iym<ZQP>w^ot w@Sak*ulA<TIP>h 'e<MER>yn b*AhE<SIL>m:
k*@x<MEH>w*T haW/*.Aniy<PAS> Wip@tw^ota<ZQP>yik@ w*mid@b*Are<TIP>k@ nA'wE<ATN>h k*@pE<MEH>lax hA<SIL>rim*w^on<PAS> raq*Ate<ZQP>k@ mib*a<TIP>`ad l@Yam*Ate<SIL>k@:
k*@mig@d*a<MEH>l d*Awiyd<PAS> Yaw*A're<ZQP>k@ b*An<TIP>w*y l@tal@p*iy*<ATN>w^ot 'E<MEH>lEp ham*Agen<PAS> t*Al<MUN>w*y `AlA<ZQP>yw k*o<TIP>l Sil@Te<MER>y hag*ib*ori<SIL>ym:
S@ne<MER>y SAda<TEB>yik@ k*iS@ne<MER>y `<HQA>pAri<TIP>ym t*@'w^ome<MUN>y Y@biy*A<ATN>h hA<SIL>rw^o`i<TIP>ym b*aW/*.<SIL>w^oSan*i<SIL>ym:
`a<MEH>d SEy*Ap<AZL>w*xa<PAS> hay*<ZQP>w^om w@nA<TIP>sw* haY*@lAli<ATN>ym 'e<MEH>lEk@ liy<PAS> 'El=ha<MUN>r ham*<ZQP>w^or w@'El=g*ib@`a<TIP>t hal*@bw^onA<SIL>h:
k*ul*A<MEH>k@ yApAh<PAS> ra`@yAti<ZQP>y w*m<TIP>w*m 'e<MER>yn b*A<SIL>k@:

'it*i<MEH>y mil*@bAnw^on<PAS> k*al*A<ZQP>h 'it*i<TIP>y mil*@bAn<MUN>w^on t*Ab<ATN>w^o'iy t*AS<MUN>w*riy | mero<MUN>'S '<HPA>mAnA<RBM>h mero<MEH>'S W@niyr<PAS> w@xEr@m<ZQP>w^on mim*@`on<MUN>w^ot '<HPA>rAy<ZQP>w^ot me<SIL>har@re<TIP>y n@meri<SIL>ym:
lib*ab@t*i<TIP>niy '<HPA>xoti<MUN>y kal*A<ATN>h lib*ab@t*i<AZL>niy<PAS> b'xd (b*@'axa<MUN>t) me<SIL>`eyna<ZQP>yik@ b*@'axa<MER>d `<HPA>nA<TIP>q miY*aw*@ronA<SIL>yik@:
mah=y*Ap<MER>w* doda<TIP>yik@ '<HPA>xoti<MUN>y kal*A<ATN>h mah=T*o<MEH>bw* doda<AZL>yik@<PAS> miy*a<ZQP>yin w@re<MER>yxa S@mAna<TIP>yik@ mik*Al=b*@WAmi<SIL>ym:
no<TEB>pEt t*iT*o<MER>p@nAh Wip@tw^ota<TIP>yik@ k*al*A<ATN>h d*@ba<MEH>S w@xAlAb<PAS> t*a<MUN>xat l@Sw^one<ZQP>k@ w@re<MER>yxa Wal@mota<TIP>yik@ k*@re<MER>yxa l@bAn<SIL>w^on:
g*a<MER>n | nA`<TIP>w*l '<HPA>xoti<MUN>y kal*A<ATN>h g*a<MER>l nA`<TIP>w*l ma`@yA<MER>n xAt<SIL>w*m:
S@lAxa<AZL>yik@<PAS> p*ar@d*e<MUN>s rim*w^oni<ZQP>ym `i<TIP>m p*@ri<MUN>y m@gAdi<ATN>ym k*@pAri<TIP>ym `im=n@rAdi<SIL>ym:
ne<MUN>r@d*@ | w@kar@k*o<RBM>m qAnEh<PAS> w@qin*Am<ZQP>w^on `i<TIP>m k*Al=`<HPA>Ye<MUN>y l@bw^onA<ATN>h mo<YET>r wa<SIL>'<HPA>hAl<ZQP>w^ot `i<TIP>m k*Al=rA'Se<MER>y b@WAmi<SIL>ym:
ma`@ya<MUN>n g*an*i<ZQP>ym b*@'e<TIP>r ma<MUN>yim xay*i<ATN>ym w@no<SIL>z@li<TIP>ym min=l@bAn<SIL>w^on:
`<MEH>w*riy YApw^on<PAS> w*b<MUN>w^o'iy teymA<ZQP>n hApi<MER>yxiy gan*i<TIP>y yiz*@l<MUN>w* b@WAmA<ATN>yw yAbo<MEH>' dw^odiy<PAS> l@gan*<ZQP>w^o w@yo'ka<TIP>l p*@ri<MER>y m@gAdA<SIL>yw:

b*A<MUN>'tiy l@gan*iy<ZIN> '<HPA>xoti<MUN>y kal*Ah<AST> 'Ari<MEH>ytiy mw^oriy<PAS> `im=b*@WAmi<ZQP>y 'Aka<MEH>l@t*iy ya`@riy<PAS> `im=d*ib@Si<ZQP>y SAti<MER>ytiy yeyni<TIP>y `im=x<HPA>lAbi<ATN>y 'ik@l<MUN>w* re`i<ZQP>ym S@t<MER>w* w@Sik@r<TIP>w* d*w^odi<SIL>ym:

'<HPA>ni<MER>y y@SenA<TIP>h w@lib*i<MUN>y `e<ATN>r q<MUN>w^ol | d*w^odi<MUN>y dw^ope<RBM>q p*it@xiy=li<GAR>y '<HPA>xoti<MEH>y ra`@yAtiy<PAS> y<SIL>w^onAti<MUN>y tam*Ati<ZQP>y SEr*o'Siy<PAS> nim@lA'=TA<ZQP>l q@wuY*w^ota<TIP>y r@si<MER>ysey lA<SIL>y@lAh:
p*ASa<AZL>T@t*iy<PAS> 'Et=k*ut*An@t*i<ZQP>y 'eykA<TIP>kAh 'El@b*ASE<ATN>n*Ah rAxa<MER>Y@t*iy 'Et=rag@la<TIP>y 'eykA<MER>kAh '<HPA>Tan*@pe<SIL>m:
d*w^odi<RBM>y SAla<MEH>x yAdw^o<PAS> min=haxo<ZQP>r w*me`a<TIP>y hAm<MER>w* `AlA<SIL>yw:
qa<MER>m@t*i<SIL>y '<HPA>ni<TIP>y lip@t*o<MUN>xa l@dw^odi<ATN>y w@yAda<MUN>y nA<SIL>T@pw*=m<RBM>w^or w@'EY@b*@`otay<PAS> m<MUN>w^or `obe<ZQP>r `a<TIP>l k*ap*<MER>w^ot ham*an@`<SIL>w*l:

p*Ata<MEH>x@t*i<SIL>y '<HPA>niy<PAS> l@dw^odi<ZQP>y w@dw^odi<TIP>y xAma<MUN>q `AbA<ATN>r nap@Siy<PAS> yA<SIL>Y@'A<MUN>h b@dab*@r<ZQP>w^o b*iq*aS@t*i<AZL>yhw*<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' m@YA'ti<ZQP>yhw* q@rA'ti<TIP>yw w@lo<MER>' `AnA<SIL>niy:
m@YA'u<DAR>niy haW/*.o<SIL>m@ri<TEB>ym has*o<SIL>b@bi<MER>ym b*A`i<TIP>yr hik*<MUN>w*niy p@YA`<ATN>w*niy nA<SIL>W@'<MEH>w* 'Et=r@diydiy<PAS> me<SIL>`Ala<ZQP>y So<SIL>m@re<TIP>y ha<SIL>xom<SIL>w^ot:
hiS@b*a<MER>`@t*iy 'Et@kE<TIP>m b*@n<MUN>w^ot y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<ATN>im 'i<SIL>m=t*im@Y@'w*<PAS> 'Et=d*w^odi<ZQP>y mah=t*ag*i<MUN>ydw* l<ZQP>w^o SE<SIL>xw^ola<MER>t 'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<TIP>h 'A<SIL>niy:
mah=d*w^ode<MUN>k@ mid*<ZQP>w^od hay*ApA<TIP>h b*an*ASi<ATN>ym mah=d*w^ode<MUN>k@ mid*<ZQP>w^od SEk*A<TIP>kAh hiS@b*a`@t*A<SIL>nw*:
d*w^odi<MER>y Yax<PAS> w@'Ad<ZQP>w^om d*Ag<TIP>w*l me<SIL>r@bAbA<SIL>h:
ro'S<TIP>w^o k*E<MUN>tEm p*A<ATN>z q@wuY*w^otAyw<PAS> t*al@t*al*i<ZQP>ym S@xor<TIP>w^ot k*A<SIL>`w^ore<SIL>b:
